entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
